info.name: Pixel Art Agent API
info.description: Spring AI powered agent for generating pixel art and 2D sprite descriptions using Ollama (qwen3-vl:4b)

request.description: Check if the Pixel Art Agent service is running
Get an example request payload for reference

body.raw:
{
  "assetType": "character",
  "description": "A brave knight with a sword and shield",
  "style": "16-bit",
  "colorPalette": "medieval",
  "size": "32x32",
  "additionalContext": "Should have idle and attack animations"
}

request.description: Generate a detailed pixel art description for a knight character

body.raw:
{
  "assetType": "weapon",
  "description": "A magical fire sword with flames",
  "style": "16-bit",
  "colorPalette": "vibrant",
  "size": "32x16",
  "additionalContext": "Should have a glowing effect"
}

request.description: Generate a detailed pixel art description for a fire sword weapon

body.raw:
{
  "assetType": "enemy",
  "description": "A cute bouncing slime monster",
  "style": "8-bit",
  "colorPalette": "pastel",
  "size": "16x16",
  "additionalContext": "Should have bounce and damage animations"
}

request.description: Generate a detailed pixel art description for a slime enemy

body.raw:
{
  "assetType": "item",
  "description": "A red health potion in a glass bottle",
  "style": "16-bit",
  "colorPalette": "vibrant",
  "size": "16x16",
  "additionalContext": "Should sparkle or glow slightly"
}

request.description: Generate a detailed pixel art description for a health potion item

request.description: Generate a detailed pixel art description for a dragon boss

body.raw:

  "assetType": "character",
  "description": "A brave knight with a sword and shield",
  "style": "16-bit",
  "colorPalette": "medieval",
  "size": "32x32",

request.description: Generate 3 variations of the knight character design
Generate 5 variations of a magical sword weapon

item.name: Refine Pixel Art - Make More Colorful

body.raw:
{
  "assetType": "character",
  "description": "A brave knight with a sword and shield",
  "style": "16-bit",
  "colorPalette": "medieval",
  "size": "32x32"
}

query.value: make it more colorful and vibrant

request.description: Refine the knight design with feedback to make it more colorful

item.name: Refine Pixel Art - Add More Detail

body.raw:
{
  "assetType": "enemy",
  "description": "A fierce red dragon boss with wings",
  "style": "32-bit",
  "colorPalette": "vibrant",
  "size": "64x64"
}

url.raw: http://localhost:8080/api/pixelart/refine?feedback=add more scales and make the wings more detailed

query.value: add more scales and make the wings more detailed

request.description: Refine the dragon design with feedback to add more detail

body.raw:
{
  "assetType": "item",
  "description": "A red health potion in a glass bottle",
  "style": "16-bit",
  "colorPalette": "vibrant",
  "size": "16x16"
}

url.raw: http://localhost:8080/api/pixelart/refine?feedback=simplify the design to make it more readable at small sizes

query.value: simplify the design to make it more readable at small sizes

request.description: Refine the health potion design by simplifying it
